NoteApp

About this project

This is a Note App in JavaScript and it can save the notes to the local storage. When users push the "Add note" button, a little note will be added. After typing in some texts, users can toggle the text area to a regular div by clicking the 'pen with a notepad' button. The notepad will be toggled to the edit mode again by pushing the same button one more time. Users can add and delete as many notes as they want. This app also uses a small library called Marked (https://github.com/markedjs/marked), so users can convert markdown into a heading, unordered list, etc.
